attributes.action: Make medical insurance for all NHS services compulsory for foreign nationals
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS is at bursting point and needs to reclaim more money from foreign visitors to the UK. 
Data collected from Patrick Minford, Professor of Applied Economics at Cardiff Business School, Cardiff University.
attributes.background: Economists for Brexit have said that the UK taxpayer subsidises unskilled foreign migrants to the tune of £6-7 billion a year to settle in the UK. (Education, Health Care, Dental, Housing & Benefit's).
